formattedAddress: 2131 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10032, USA
adrFormatAddress: 2131 Amsterdam Ave, New York, NY 10032, USA

editorialSummary.text: Storefront Chinese spot with basics plus spicy or healthy options to eat in or take out.

originalText.text: We ordered for delivery and the food always arrives hot. My husband loves the sesame chicken with fried green plantains and they never disappoint. If anything is wrong with your order the take care of the issue right away and redeliver. Sometimes I ask for special requests with no problems they will prepare it matter how weird it is. ‚ò∫Ô∏è

If anything is wrong with your order the take care of the issue right away and redeliver. Sometimes I ask for special requests with no problems they will prepare it matter how weird it is. ‚ò∫Ô∏è

originalText.text: I had a horrible experience ordering from this location last week. I originally ordered the Thai fried rice, which did not taste anything like thai food. It taste like regular Chinese fried rice. I called to let them know that what I ordered and paid for, was not what I received. He started off by saying well I am the only customer that has a problem with their food. But I know what thai food should taste like and that was not it. He went back and fourth with me before he asked if he could do something else. I said yes replace the food with something else. He agreed and would replace it with the pad Thai noodles. I received my food and started eating from the side. The flavor that should have been present was not. I found a fly in the middle of my food, you can tell it was deliberately put there. This is disgusting and absolutely unacceptable. Just because you feel a way that one customer does not like your food, doesn‚Äôt mean that you go and sabotage their food further. Michael needs to learn respect for his paying customers. And needs to not run a business because he does not put his customers first.

originalText.text: Lol it's looks like a storage(atmosphere) that serves 4 star Chinese food. It's tasty as fk. And the little lady who takes the orders is a hustler. She works very hard to make sure your happy. I like her, and her food looks and taste good. üòã Jade house apparently has a loyal fanbase. I personally prefer Thai but this was good. Far better quality and service than Splendid China on 161 ewwww

originalText.text:
Update: They have stopped buying tiny chicken wings. They have once again started taking cards. Their chicken broccoli recipe seems to have changed.

Used to be a great place to order from. They buy the smallest chicken wings they can get. They over fry their chicken. They have stopped taking credit cards without putting a sign up  or letting you know on the phone, so beware of going in thinking they still take cards. Overall a drop in quality and service.
